title: 0.00 MB stuck at 99%
body:
hey guys, hope you're having a good day

There is nothing for the file to download but for some reason it is still on 99%. No files were deleted and somehow the patcher is still going. I'm pretty bad at tech so help would be loved.

thanks

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having a hiccup so it can't finish downloading necessary updates.  No worries, just go over to our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  I hope you have a good day as well and that this help!
